org.apache.juneau.rest.client.mock

Class MockHttpClientConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.client.mock.MockHttpClientConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpClientConnectionManager
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MockHttpClientConnectionManager
extends Object
implements HttpClientConnectionManager
    An implementation of HttpClientConnectionManager specifically for use in mocked connections using the MockHttpConnection class.
    Deprecated - Use org.apache.juneau.restmock2
    This implementation is NOT thread safe.
